data.name: Shadowy Contracts
data.detailed_description:
Shadowy Contracts is a stealth and RPG hybrid, where the player can can go on contracts to kill targets for gold. The gold can be used to hire and lead mercenaries into battle, and/or use the gold to purchase weapons and potions.

Features:


  • Play over 8 contract and 5 battle levels. More levels will be added during Early Access.
  • Loot and buy over 52 different weapons, 38 armor sets, and 21 weapon effects/chants. More to be added in Early Access.
  • Progress by not only looting weapons, but also learning abilities and spells using the talent tree.
  • Levels and enemies scale with you, so each level will keep being a challenge while you progress.
  • Customize your character freely using the character creation.
